Class TwoDicePig

Namespace
Pig.Variations
Assembly
Pig.Variations.dll

Implements the "Two-Dice Pig" variation. This version increases the stakes by adding a "Snake Eyes" penalty that can reset a player's entire game progress.

public class TwoDicePig : IPigVariation

TwoDicePig(int)

Implements the "Two-Dice Pig" variation. This version increases the stakes by adding a "Snake Eyes" penalty that can reset a player's entire game progress.

public TwoDicePig(int winningScore = 100)

Property Value

int

Methods

ProcessRoll(IEnumerable<int>)

Processes a two-dice roll according to the following rules:

  • Snake Eyes (Two 1s)The player loses their entire total score and the turn ends.
  • Single 1The player scores 0 for the turn and the turn ends.
  • No 1sThe sum of both dice is added to the turn bank.
public RollResult ProcessRoll(IEnumerable<int> dice)

Parameters

dice IEnumerable<int>

The values of the two dice rolled.

Returns

RollResult

A RollResult reflecting the outcome of the two-dice throw.
